Package com.elegido.codes.date.util

Class DateConverter

java.lang.Object
com.elegido.codes.date.util.DateConverter
public class DateConverter extends Object
Utility class providing methods for date and time calculations.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentDate

      public static String getCurrentDate(String format)
      Utility method to retrieve the current date and time formatted according to the specified format.
      Parameters:
      format - The desired format for the output date string.
      Returns:
      A formatted date string representing the current date and time.

    • getHoursFromDate

      public static long getHoursFromDate(Date date)
      Utility method to calculate the number of hours between a given Date object and the current date.
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object from which to calculate hours.
      Returns:
      The absolute number of hours between the provided Date and the current date.

    • getHoursFromDate

      public static long getHoursFromDate(String date, String format)
      Utility method to calculate the number of hours between a given date string and the current date. The date string is parsed using the specified format.
      Parameters:
      date - The date string to calculate hours from.
      format - The format pattern of the input date string.
      Returns:
      The absolute number of hours between the parsed date and the current date. If parsing fails, the method returns -1.

    • getTimeUnitFromDate

      public static long getTimeUnitFromDate(Date date, int toUnit)
      Utility method to calculate the time difference between a given Date and the current date and time, and convert it to a specified time unit.
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object to calculate the time difference from.
      toUnit - The desired time unit to convert to. Use constants from DateConverter (e.g., DateConverter.SECONDS).
      Returns:
      The time value in the specified unit. If the specified unit is not recognized, the method returns -1.

    • getTimeUnitFromDate

      public static long getTimeUnitFromDate(String date, String format, int toUnit)
      Utility method to calculate the time difference between a given date string and the current date and time, and convert it to a specified time unit.
      Parameters:
      date - The date string to calculate the time difference from.
      format - The format pattern of the input date string.
      toUnit - The desired time unit to convert to. Use constants from DateConverter (e.g., DateConverter.SECONDS).
      Returns:
      The time value in the specified unit. If the input date string cannot be parsed or the specified unit is not recognized, the method returns -1.

    • getHoursBetweenDates

      public static long getHoursBetweenDates(String fromDate, String toDate, String format)
      Utility method to calculate the number of hours between two date strings using a specified date format. If either of the provided date strings cannot be parsed using the specified date format, the method returns -1 to indicate parsing failure.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - The starting date string.
      toDate - The ending date string.
      format - The date format pattern to use for parsing the provided date strings.
      Returns:
      The number of hours between the two parsed dates, or -1 if parsing fails for any date.

    • getHoursBetweenDates

      public static long getHoursBetweenDates(Date fromDate, Date toDate)
      Utility method to calculate the number of hours between two Date objects.
      Parameters:
      fromDate - The starting date.
      toDate - The ending date.
      Returns:
      The number of hours between the two dates.

    • changeDateFormat

      public static String changeDateFormat(String date, String inputFormat, String language, String region)
      Utility method to change the format of a date string and localize it based on the specified language and region.
      Parameters:
      date - The date string to be formatted.
      inputFormat - The format of the input date string.
      language - The language code for localization (e.g., "en" for English).
      region - The region code for localization (e.g., "US" for the United States).
      Returns:
      A formatted and localized date string.

    • changeDateFormat

      public static String changeDateFormat(Date date, String language, String region)
      Utility method to format a Date object and localize it based on the specified language and region.
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object to be formatted.
      language - The language code for localization (e.g., "en" for English).
      region - The region code for localization (e.g., "US" for the United States).
      Returns:
      A formatted and localized date string representing the provided Date object.

    • changeDateFormat

      public static String changeDateFormat(String date, String inputFormat, int style, Locale locale)
      Utility method to change the format of a date string and localize it based on the specified style and locale.
      Parameters:
      date - The date string to be formatted.
      inputFormat - The format of the input date string.
      style - The style for date formatting (e.g., 'DateFormat.FULL', 'DateFormat.SHORT').
      locale - The locale for localization.
      Returns:
      A formatted and localized date string.

    • changeDateFormat

      public static String changeDateFormat(Date date, int style, Locale locale)
      Utility method to format a Date object and localize it based on the specified style and locale.
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object to be formatted.
      style - The style for date formatting (e.g., 'DateFormat.FULL', 'DateFormat.SHORT').
      locale - The locale for localization.
      Returns:
      A formatted and localized date string.

    • changeDateFormat

      public static String changeDateFormat(String date, String inputFormat, String outputFormat)
      Utility method to change the format of a date string.
      Parameters:
      date - The date string to be formatted.
      inputFormat - The format of the input date string.
      outputFormat - The desired format for the output date string.
      Returns:
      A formatted date string based on the specified input and output formats. If the conversion fails, the original date string is returned.

    • changeDateFormat

      public static String changeDateFormat(Date date, String outputFormat)
      Utility method to format a Date object based on a specified output format.
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object to be formatted.
      outputFormat - The desired format for the output date string.
      Returns:
      A formatted date string based on the specified output format.

    • getFormattedTime

      public static String getFormattedTime(String date, String format)
      Utility method to format the time difference between a given date string and the current date and time. The result is formatted as HH:mm:ss.
      Parameters:
      date - The date string to calculate the time difference from.
      format - The format pattern of the input date string.
      Returns:
      A formatted time string representing the time difference in HH:mm:ss format. If the input date string cannot be parsed, the method returns "00:00:00".

    • getFormattedTime

      public static String getFormattedTime(Date date)
      Utility method to format the time difference between a given Date object and the current date and time. The result is formatted as HH:mm:ss.
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object to calculate the time difference from.
      Returns:
      A formatted time string representing the time difference in HH:mm:ss format.
